name: Pop-up Champ
description:
See how high your score can get in a short 30-second burst!

Welcome to your boring corporate office job! Your task as the I.T. specialist is to close pop-up windows all day. Enjoy the monotony of the plain background and elevator music as you do your dreaded daily task for a measly $7.25 an hour! Don’t be shy, comment your high score!

This game was inspired by cookie clicker and Grand Theft Auto's famous "close the ads" minigame.

Art by Bogdan Banica, music by Dar Golan, sound effects from mixkit.co.
